Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and quality, it's worth more than $12000 to us. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, we are offering it to you for $14999. We believe this price reflects its true value while offering you an excellent opportunity to acquire something truly special. If you have any questions or would like to discuss further, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,999. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,999
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
